name: Abandon Hope
text:
As an additional cost to cast Abandon Hope, discard X cards.
Look at target opponent's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.
flavor: As Gerrard's form vanished into the maw of trees, Hanna mouthed a silent plea, mourning a crushed dream.
originalText: Choose and discard X cards: Look at target opponent's hand and choose X of those cards. That player discards the chosen cards.
